name: The Barnkeeper
description:
We made this project for group work in my school we with 3 Game Artists and 3 Game Designers (including me !) and a Sound Designer. I present to you "The Banrkeeper", a game where a runaway female slave called Renée, who escaped exploitation during the American civil war in 1862. You hide and get trapped in an abandoned barn where you will have to find the exit while being hunted by a monster. Throughout the game, you will discover the truth about what was going on in this barn and what is this monster.

This game takes about 20 min to complete if you do not know the game.

Controls :

Move - Z, Q, S, D

Lantern - A

Interact - E

Climb - F

Inventory - TAB

Pause - Escape

Credits :

Game Artists :

- Clothilde Arlaut https://itch.io/profile/clothilde-arlaut

- Théo Durand https://itch.io/profile/theo-durand

- Joey Cournez

- Vincent Py https://healingstorm.itch.io/

Sound Designer :

- Roxane Pilot https://twitter.com/PilotRoxane

Have Fun !
